tags: this is the kind of shit that drove sebastian stan away from IG
summary: Wowwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww i’ve been called some nasty names on anon today lol but u know what? I don’t give a crap because yeah...
body:
Wowwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwwww i’ve been called some nasty names on anon today lol but u know what? I don’t give a crap because yeah am I defending the honor of someone i’ll most likely never meet or see? yes, will that stop me though? no.

You can have your opinion and I can have mine. We don’t have to agree on it either, but i’ll say it for the 9,00000000 time, I don’t see anything wrong with age gaps, I don’t anything wrong with chris going to that club, that’s it goodday :P

summary: I don’t know what’s going on with the Chris Evans and the girl situation, but just saying right now: Let the man live his god...
body:
I don’t know what’s going on with the Chris Evans and the girl situation, but just saying right now:

Let the man live his god damn life, he’s not a child, and we can’t control him. It’s okay if you’re upset, but to harass Chris and said girl is unnecessary and uncalled for. If you really love Chris you’ll be understanding of the situation and not torment that poor woman.

blog.name: saywhatjenn
blog.title: Professional Scatterbrain
blog.description: Personal blog! Currently obsessed with To All the Boys I’ve Loved Before, but also an outlet for all my obsessions, including, but not limited to, Jim and Pam, The Office, New Girl, OINTB, John Krasinski, The Handmaids Tale, The Crown, The Man in the High Castle, Joe and Juliana, This is Us, Chicago Med, Will and Natalie, trashy MTV Challenges, historical fiction, baking, the beach, bees, my idiot dogs, insane children and ridiculous husband. I laugh at everything and cry easily. Ravenclaw. Libra. ISTJ. Beth Greene forever. Fight me, Scott Gimple.

question: i'm canceling chris
answer:
Cancel Chris, if you must, because the less of you there are, the more Chris there is for the rest of us and he’s already spread pretty thin. 

But don’t criticize him for absolutely no reason other than he did a thing that you don’t like. He’s not a puppet or a toy for you to control.

He’s an actual human being who is just trying to live his life. You are not infallible or perfect and I really wish you’d stop pretending you are while you hold others up to impossible standards.

So cancel him because you’re not a real fan.

reblog.comment:

summary: Fandoms: WE LOVE AND SUPPORT WOMEN HERE Fandoms actually: Hell no. If there is even a woman standing next to my male fav, I will...
body:
Fandoms: WE LOVE AND SUPPORT WOMEN HERE

Fandoms actually: Hell no. If there is even a woman standing next to my male fav, I will harass her and stalk her social media and slut shame her. If a woman has any romantic ties/intrest in him, I will come up with lies and fake BS so I can slander her name! If a female character even breathes in the direction of my fav, she is a slut. I AM THE ONLY ONE MEANT FOR THEM EVEN THOUGH THEY HAVE NO IDEA WHO I AM AND I AM JUST PROJECTING MY OWN ISSUES ONTO COMPLETE STRANGERS INSTEAD OF GOING TO THERAPY AND GETTING HELP LIKE A GODDAMN NORMAL PERSON. I RATHER HARASS AND DEGRADE THINGS LIKE A FUCKING RABID IDIOT.

summary: If I ever get kidnapped my plan of action is to fake Stockholm syndrome and literally screw my way around them until they...
body:
If I ever get kidnapped my plan of action is to fake Stockholm syndrome and literally screw my way around them until they eventually forget to lock the door

Or, you know, scream “CHRIS EVANS WILL SAVE ME I KNOW HE WILL” over and over again until it comes true

title: Support The Girls
description:
Imagine if all the MCU movies we know were actual life-story biopics in the MCU.

Now imagine how Bucky would spend his birthday the weekend Captain Marvel came out, after all the trolls of the world tried to tank the score.

Just a short little warm-up fic, both for Bucky’s birthday and for @debwalsh, who has been waiting patiently for *cough* over a year for her FLPR fic, as I continue to work thru the worst writers block I’ve ever had. The fic is being written now, babe! And I’m loving it lots!

~~~~~~

Steve waved a hand to cut Bucky off. “I really don’t want to spend your birthday getting into fights with people over a movie.”

Bucky narrowed his eyes before pulling Steve off to the side. “It’s not just a movie, Steve. It’s Carol’s story.”

“I’m aware of that.”

“And that fucking tomato site –”

“You mean Rotten Tomatoes?”

Bucky scowled. “There’s definitely something rotten about it…” He shook his head and blinked back up at Steve. “Anyway, that fucking site has trolls trying to tank the score of this film simply because Marvel Studios finally got around to telling the story of one of the girls on our team –”

“Okay, you and I both know the only reason they haven’t told Nat’s story yet is because she wasn’t ready.”

“But she’s ready now.”

“Yes.” Steve nodded. “Which is why the script is in the works.”

“Okay, but…” Bucky looked around again, more wary now than anything. “But what if this movie does tank, and they decide to scrap Nat’s?”

Steve just shrugged and shoved his hands into his pockets. “Then we make good on our threat.”

“You mean we walk.”

Steve nodded again. “Yup.”
